930 
WGUS83 KIND 080259
FLSIND
FLOOD STATEMENT
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE INDIANAPOLIS IN
959 PM EST SUN DEC 7 2014

......The Flood Warning is no longer in effect for portions of the
following rivers in Indiana...

  Wabash River...

.The Wabash River at Mount Carmel is no longer expected to go above
flood stage. Therefore...the warning has been cancelled.

Precautionary/Preparedness Actions...

Be alert to flood debris on previously flooded roads. Keep children 
away from flooded areas. Recreational and agricultural interests 
should remain alert to changing river conditions.

For detailed flood information go to weather.gov/ind on the web. From
the blue menu bar on the left side of the page...click on rivers and 
lakes.

ILC047-059-185-193-INC051-083-129-080329-
/O.CAN.KIND.FL.W.0224.000000T0000Z-141211T0600Z/
/MCRI2.N.ER.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NO/
859 PM CST SUN DEC 7 2014

The Flood Warning is cancelled for
  The Wabash River at Mount Carmel.
* At 8:00 PM Sunday the stage was 16.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 19.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will crest below flood stage at 18.5 feet 
  early Tuesday morning.
